caption.p: ( a) Bioclimatic suitability (logistic output) of Podocarpus parlatorei in northern Argentina and southern Bolivia under modern conditions (approx. 1960–1990) based on a final model of 8 variables. ( b) and ( c) P. parlatorei mean suitability predicted by projecting model of figure 1 a onto climatic conditions predicted by 13 global circulation models for 2070 (2061–2080) under the RCP2.6 and RCP8.5 AR5 greenhouse gas concentration trajectories, respectively. Numbered dots represent P. parlatorei populations listed in table 1.
